creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: deep indigo-black; dyed design of large green, blue and yellow leaves from bottom hem to waist; orange line design of tiger on proper left bottom in front and proper right lower back; wide deep indigo strip hem along opening, forming collar; off-white outlines of characters on hem strip slightly below neck collar on both sides; large off-white outline of character on upper back; short folded hem around bottom and sleeve openings; off-white lining on interior upper back and shoulders; katazome and tsutsugaki technique
title: Stevedore's jacket
